title: Ubuntu Install Problem

labels.name: stale
labels.description: PRs or Issue that are inactive

body:
i cant install mew on my linux box
After this error i cant try to reinstall , After npm run build command it says complete done but nothing is happing. 
I have tryed npm install -g increase-memory-limit and increase-memory-limit but no luck again 


Distro: ubuntu 18 .04
Node: v10.15.3
Npm: 6.4.1
Problem : npm run build

> myetherwallet@5.3.2 update:swap /root/w/MyEtherWallet
> node compileBaseSwapOptions.js

Complete

⠴  Building for production...
<--- Last few GCs --->

[24661:0x27b20a0]   226437 ms: Mark-sweep 995.3 (1267.1) -> 995.3 (1246.1) MB, 652.3 / 0.0 ms  (average mu = 0.412, current mu = 0.010) last resort GC in old space requested

I guess i have resolved Allocation failed - JavaScript heap out of memory error with this command
export NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192
but now it gives

Update
After add 4 gb more ram to my vps errors are changed. I have wait like 20min npm build install and gave this error :(

⠇  Building for production...

 ERROR  Failed to compile with 1 errors                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            2:33:56 PM

js/vendors.45cf1593.js from Terser
Error: Call retries were exceeded
    at ChildProcessWorker.initialize (/root/ww/MyEtherWallet/node_modules/@vue/cli-service/node_modules/jest-worker/build/workers/ChildProcessWorker.js:230:21)
    at ChildProcessWorker._onExit (/root/ww/MyEtherWallet/node_modules/@vue/cli-service/node_modules/jest-worker/build/workers/ChildProcessWorker.js:307:12)

Again Update:
I ignore the previous error and try to start mew with npm start but it starting dev mode not production mode. I have clone production mode not dev.  I didnt use this command npm run dev
it says;

 App running at:
  - Local:   https://localhost:8080
  - Network: https://localhost:8080

  Note that the development build is not optimized.
  To create a production build, run npm run build.

after npm run build its same , dev mode starting again.

I have fixed all error just there is one 
npm run starting development server but tutorial says it will start production server.
how can i run production server ?
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed within 10 days if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
